nodes.description: 周四，一名袭击者驾车对印度准军事部队车队发动自杀式袭击，造成42名士兵死亡。
nodes.support_text: when 20-year-old Adil Dar rammed his car filled with explosives into a convoy carrying Indian paramilitary forces, killing 42 of them.

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦武装组织“穆罕默德军”宣布对此次袭击负责。
nodes.support_text: Pakistan-based group Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM) claimed responsibility for the attack, the deadliest in nearly 30 years of the Kashmir conflict.

nodes.description: 袭击引发了对居住在印度本土各地的克什米尔人的仇恨和报复性攻击浪潮。
nodes.support_text: Thursday's suicide attack on Indian forces in India-administered Kashmir has triggered a wave of hate and revenge attacks against Kashmiris residing in different parts of mainland India.

nodes.description: 周五，一群暴民在德拉敦殴打了一些克什米尔学生。
nodes.support_text: Nisar Ahmad (name changed), 23, who is studying physics at an institute in Dehradun, capital of the northern Uttarakhand state, told Al Jazeera that Kashmiri students were beaten by a mob on Friday.

nodes.description: 周六，一群人在德拉敦集会，高喊口号要求将克什米尔人赶出去。
nodes.support_text: Ahmad said a group of around 70 people took out a rally in the area on Saturday, "chanting slogans like 'shoot the traitor Kashmiris', 'drive them out'".

nodes.description: 多地的克什米尔学生报告其宿舍被暴民包围，并受到离开或面临后果的最后通牒。
nodes.support_text: Asma Ashraf, 24, a student of science in Dehradun, told Al Jazeera that she fears for her life after her hostel was "surrounded by a mob".

nodes.description: 印度公民在社交媒体上广泛发声，为受威胁的克什米尔人提供住所和安全保障。
nodes.support_text: Like everyone else, my home is also open to anyone needing help. Especially, if any Kashmir women living in Delhi/NCR feels like she needs to go to someone, please DM.

nodes.description: 分裂主义叛乱分子正在为实现穆斯林占多数的整个克什米尔的独立而战斗。
nodes.support_text: The separatist rebels have been fighting for the independence of all of Muslim-majority Kashmir.

nodes.description: Dawood在袭击后无法外出移动。
nodes.support_text: 他无法外出。

nodes.description: 暴民进入了Dawood的房间。
nodes.support_text: 暴民进入了我们的房间。

nodes.description: Dawood躲在浴室里以确保安全。
nodes.support_text: 我躲在浴室里。

nodes.description: Dawood补充说明了更多学生被困且不敢外出的情况。
nodes.support_text: Dawood补充说，还有更多学生被困在自己的宿舍里，不敢外出。

nodes.description: 学生们担心在路上会遭遇更多袭击。
nodes.support_text: 我们担心在路上会遭到更多袭击。

nodes.description: 作者指控巴基斯坦正在庆祝来自比哈尔的这些可怕场景。
nodes.support_text: 作者指控巴基斯坦正在庆祝来自比哈尔的这些可怕场景。

nodes.description: 作者号召大家不要玷污国家的肌理。
nodes.support_text: 作者号召大家不要玷污国家的肌理。

nodes.description: Sara Khursheed 告诉半岛电视台，克什米尔人正被以怀疑的眼光看待，并描述了她下班回家途中的经历。
nodes.support_text: “我们正被以怀疑的眼光看待，” Sara Khursheed 告诉半岛电视台。“昨天我下班回家...”

nodes.description: 公众以怀疑的眼光看待克什米尔人。
nodes.support_text: “我们正被以怀疑的眼光看待，” Sara Khursheed 告诉半岛电视台。

nodes.description: Sara Khursheed 在下班回家途中。
nodes.support_text: “昨天我下班回家...”

nodes.description: 一名路人声称克什米尔人对杀戮事件感到高兴。
nodes.support_text: “一名路人走过来说，‘这些克什米尔人对杀戮事件感到高兴。’”

nodes.description: 暴力暴民通过高音喇叭宣布，威胁克什米尔学生立即离开他们的出租屋。

nodes.description: 学生们从昨天起就开始逃亡。
nodes.support_text: We have been on the run since yesterday.

nodes.description: 学生们离开了他们的出租屋。
nodes.support_text: We left the rented place.

nodes.description: 管理部门将学生们安置在一个有安保的宿舍里。
nodes.support_text: the administration has put us in a hostel with security.

nodes.description: Bashir陈述说，暴力暴民威胁了克什米尔学生。
nodes.support_text: Bashir says a violent mob threatened the Kashmiri students.

nodes.description: Bashir透露了自己的姓氏。
nodes.support_text: He reveals his second name.

nodes.support_text: they have ensured us.

nodes.support_text: for students to report threats or attacks.
